subject: [Lab 13] Q8: Driving the Cyber Highways
content:
Q8: Driving the Cyber Highways

Please post all questions you have below concerning Q8: Driving the Cyber Highways in the follow-ups.

If you are stuck on this question, feel free to read through the follow-up responses to see if you can draw any ideas from them.

threads.question: Could you give some hints? I could figure it out by creating new table. But I do not know whether there are better methods

follow-ups.feedback: Once you have solved the previous part, you can simply join the `stores` table with the `shopping_list` table and just take the `SUM` of the `Mbs`, no grouping required.
fyi, the "Mb" column is not called "Mb" but "Mbs"
